What services do you offer?: JimmyPass Educational and Consulting Services offers academic tutoring, exam preparation (WAEC, NECO, JAMB), study abroad consulting, and educational guidance.
Where are you located?: We are located in Enugu, Nigeria. You can contact us via our Facebook page or visit our office during working hours.
Do you help with study abroad?: Yes, we provide study abroad consulting including school selection, application guidance, and documentation support.
Do you prepare students for WAEC and JAM: Yes, we offer structured preparation for WAEC, NECO, and JAMB exams.
What are your working hours?: Our working hours are Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm.
